title: The Miser's Chest
caption: A miser hides his gold. He counts it every day. But never spends a coin. Wealth unused is worthless.
prompt: A dimly lit cellar. An old, wooden chest overflowing with gold coins. A gaunt, hunched figure with greedy eyes peering into the chest.

title: The Hidden Gold
caption: He buries his gold deep. Afraid of thieves and loss. He guards it with his life. But what good is it there?
prompt: A dark, muddy field. A hole in the ground with a small, treasure chest being lowered into it. A suspicious figure looking around nervously.

title: The Poor Man's Observation
caption: A poor man watches him. He sees the wasted wealth. He understands the truth. Riches serve when shared.
prompt: A simple, thatched-roof cottage. A figure in worn clothing observing from a window. The figure's face shows a mixture of pity and understanding.

title: The Discovery of the Loss
caption: One day, the gold is gone. Stolen or scattered away. The miser is left with nothing. His hoard brought only pain.
prompt: The same wooden chest from the first image, now empty and broken. The miser is wailing and clutching his head in despair.

title: The Miser's Regret
caption: He realizes his mistake. Hoarding brought no joy, no peace. He learned a painful lesson. Giving brings true riches.
prompt: The miser sitting alone in his empty house, looking dejected and filled with regret. Sunlight streams through a window, symbolizing a glimmer of hope.

title: The Baker's Generosity
caption: A baker shares his bread. Feeding the hungry and poor. His kindness brings him joy. Wealth in action brings reward.
prompt: A bustling bakery. The baker, with a warm smile, handing out loaves of bread to people in need. The scene is filled with light and warmth.

title: The Farmer's Abundance
caption: A farmer shares his harvest. Helping his neighbors thrive. His generosity returns. Creating abundance for all.
prompt: A bountiful field. The farmer sharing his crops with his neighbors. Everyone is smiling and working together.

title: The Wise Man's Advice
caption: A wise man speaks the truth. "Wealth is meant to be used. To help and build and share." A lesson for us all.
prompt: A wise old man with a long white beard, sitting under a tree, imparting wisdom to a younger person. His expression is calm and knowing.

title: The Open Hand
caption: Open your hand, and give. Share your wealth, and live. For wealth unused is lost. Kindness is its true cost.
prompt: An open hand offering a single gold coin to another hand reaching out in need. The background is blurred, focusing attention on the act of giving.

title: A Happy Community
caption: A thriving community. Built on kindness and trust. Where wealth is shared and used. Happiness for one, happiness for all.
prompt: A vibrant village scene with people laughing, working together, and sharing resources. The image conveys a sense of community and well-being.
